item.title: Making ::war say a warning message
item.dc:creator: @EALclan EALclan
item.description:
@EALclan wrote:

okay well i got a ::war command and i get complaints bout luring all day, so i would like some help on how to add a message like " are you sure you want to tele???" “no i wouldnt like to tele” or sumtin like that
if so thanks so much! im using pk planet source. thanks

and here is my command, right now it doesnt let u choose it just teles u automaticly. i would like to make it where u “have” to click yes to go there. please help!

if(command.startsWith(“war”) && playerRights >= 0){
interfaceEffect = 13;
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126("", 2494);
sendFrame126(“I want to go to Lvl 50 Wildy!”, 2495);
sendFrame126("", 2496);
sendFrame126(“Never mind.”, 2497);
sendFrame126("", 2498);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
sendFrame164(2492);
flushOutStream();
triggerTele(3288, 3886, 0);

Read full topic
